This code book is used to describes data created in tidy.txt. It contains a data frame with 180 observations of 88 variables. Each element is the mean of the correponding record for a subject and the activity of that suject.

# Subject label
The experiments have been carried out with a group of 30 volunteers within an age bracket of 19-48 years. The label of suject is in range [1,30].

# Activity label
1 WALKING

2 WALKING_UPSTAIRS

3 WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS

4 SITTING

5 STANDING

6 LAYING

#Features/records
```{r echo = FALSE}
source("run_analysis.R")

colnames(Data.melted.mean[,3:ncol(Data.melted.mean)])
```
